Happen is equipped with a suite of equipment and facilities is able to cater any occasion ranging from corporate events such as business meetings, networking, seminars, workshops and product launches to recreational events like team-bonding, cohesion, award & appreciation ceremonies, birthday celebrations and many more.

At KidZania Singapore, kids can independently explore the 81,000 square feet kid-sized City, complete with buildings, paved streets, vehicles and a functioning economy, just like in a real world! Through realistic role-play, they learn about different careers, the inner-workings of a city and the concept of managing money.

With so many fun and exciting activities available for play, fully furnished with chairs and tables, KidZania Singapore will be a great and fun place for parents to host a kid’s birthday party for their kids!

Gazetted as a national monument in 2015, Jurong Town Hall now houses the Trade Association Hub, which supports a vibrant ecosystem of trade associations and chambers and plays a critical role in the next phase of Singapore's economic development.

The latest nightlife trailblazer to make waves in Singapore, The Pump Room is unique dining, event space and entertainment venue occupying a prime spot in Clarke Quay - Singapore’s coveted F&B and lifestyle destination. Opened in early December 2006, this microbrewery and bistro is made up of three concepts that will appeal to anyone looking for memorable drinking, dining and partying experience - a microbrewery, bistro and a bar with a live band and room to party. The Pump Room is the best live band dance club in town, and only the finest musicians get to rock out on our stage. Artichoke is a Middle Eastern-inspired restaurant in the same cool compound with Objectifs. a non-profit art space dedicated to photography and film, in the heart of Singapore’s Arts and Heritage district. At the helm is chef-owner Bjorn Shen, who’s been slinging out plates of tasty food to you beautiful peeps since 2010. 

Artichoke is probably the least authentic Middle Eastern restaurant around. And that's exactly how it should be. The food is fun and creative, drawing inspiration from Middle Eastern flavors and ingredients; as opposed to being traditional. Imagine funky stuff like doner kebab fried rice, shawarma spiced octopus, honey za’atar fried chicken and baklava soft serve ice cream, all served to a backdrop of 60’s soul and 90’s hip-hop. If you wanna get hammered, Artichoke has got the plug with a mean wine list, alongside ice cold beers, ciders, Sunday Punch cocktails and a killer G&T.

If that ain't your thing, or if you're under aged, don't break a sweat. The bar at Artichoke also pumps out Turkish sodas, soft serve milkshakes, rosewater lemonade and coffee from our friends Common Man Coffee Roasters. Get your friends and family down and celebrate your Birthdays, Anniversaries and corporate events/parties with Artichoke.

Set in an iconic heritage building that is SO Sofitel Singapore, the rooftop pool bar 1927 offers guests a luxurious urban oasis set in the heart of CBD with its glitzy cocktails and ritzy decor. Discerning epicureans can look forward to embarking on a gastronomical journey with the bar's innovative selection of artisanal equatorial cocktails, delicately paired with tantalizing sharing platters of modern tapas and bar bites. A charismatic rooftop lounge with dashes of tropical chic elements surrounding the lush infinity-edged pool, 1927 creates an exclusive dining experience that is inviting by day, intimate by night. Be it a farewell party for a colleague or a year-end Dinner and Dance, this venue will surely make it a night to remember.

With four different locations, Flower Field Hall, Waterview Room, Silver Leaf and The Meadow, Gardens by the Bay would certainly leave every guest with a lasting impression of the place. Under the canopy of silver-hued Supertrees and overlooking the Dragonfly Lake, Silver Leaf offers an intimate setting for private and exclusive events. The scenic garden setting yields countless picture-perfect moments, with the iconic Flower Dome and Marina Bay skyline in the background. The Waterview Room can be used as a standalone room for private events or to complement events taking place in the Flower Field Hall as both venues are adjoining. Be enthralled by the Marina Bay waterfront view and Bay East Garden while enjoying precious moments during your events here. The Meadow, Singapore's largest outdoor garden event space, boasting a standing capacity of up to 30,000 people. 

The panoramic view of the iconic Conservatories, Supertrees and Singapore's downtown cityscape provides a stunning backdrop for mega events and nights to remember. Nestled within the Flower Dome, Flower Field Hall engages guests with a sensory experience. Overlooking the changing Flower Field display on one side, and a spectacular view of the Marina Bay skyline on the other, this indoor space captivates with its picturesque backdrop of perpetual spring. Host your event amidst the beautiful sea of flowers at Gardens by the Bay, the perfect location for birthday parties, bachelor parties, hen parties and many more!

Hero’s is a sprawling 2,500 sq-ft saloon style venue with a fully-stocked bar, full menu (burgers, kebabs, pizzas, mixed platters and other pub grub) and live band set-up. Our unique VIP area comprises beer-tap tables where patrons can pour their own pints. Hero’s also boasts a spacious main hall as well as a comfortable alfresco area. On Fridays and Saturdays, Circular Road is closed allowing us to add street seating. External catering and events beyond regular opening hours are available upon request.

This huge and spacious event venue is great for accommodating a large number of guests. The flexible space and versatile floor plan are great for hosting a multitude of events such as birthday parties, hen parties, bachelor parties, Christmas parties, etc.

tagline: C Side - Coastes, Bikini Bar, Sand Bar & Flame
description:
Located on the tiny island of Sentosa, C Side is the epitome of beach culture and is also the most authentic beach destination in Singapore. C Side is the ultimate escape from the hustle bustle of the city, with a mix of entertainment, activities, parties, food & beverage options, C Side has something for everyone. With panoramic views of the Siloso shoreline, C Side offers a great vantage point to take in glorious sunsets and beautiful displays of fireworks every evening. With an expansive beach and deck space, C Side is a perfect venue for small and large scale events whilst keeping that intimate feel.

The ideal place for corporate functions, dinner and dance, family day, networking events, product launches, birthday parties and weddings, C Side is the most convenient beach getaway in Singapore. With panoramic views of the Siloso shoreline, C Side offers a great vantage point to take in glorious sunsets and beautiful displays of fireworks every evening. With an expansive beach and deck space, C Side is a perfect venue for small and large scale events whilst keeping that intimate feel. At C Side, beach-lovers can truly unwind and enjoy the sun, sand, sea and good food! C Side is a combination of five outlets, each with its own distinct vibe and concept: Coastes, Sand Bar, Bikini Bar and Flame.Minimum Spending: $50 per person on Weekdays
                                 $88 per person on Weekends 

Prices are subject to GST & Service Charge. For more info or choice of menus, please inquire.

Housed in a 5,000 square foot venue at the 5 Star Pan Pacific Hotel located at Marina Bay, Bang Bang draws its inspiration from the world’s top high-energy nightclubs and brings it into an intimate setting with a capacity of 400 revelers. Alongside smartly appointed furniture, fixtures, and eye-catching décor, Bang Bang will house a state-of-the-art L’Acoustics sound system as well as a 45 foot long high-resolution LED wall, bringing your experience to the next level.

Have a banging time at Bang Bang for your Birthday parties, Christmas parties, team-bonding, etc. Bang Bang is the ultimate location for party goers to let down their hair and have a great time with friends!

Talay Thai serves authentic Thai food with an urban twist – it’s a modern, warm and avant-garde “drinking hole” where suits and food collide. 

Talay Thai is set to make waves as the newest Thai tapas concept in Singapore situated at the hottest wine and dine precinct – Clarke Quay. The interior décor exudes a resounding punch of personality; the orchestrated harmony of the rustic deep red floors, electric fish scale feature walls and ornate traditional Thai displays is a sight to behold and drinking hole worth a go.

With an extensive menu of over 50 items, Talay Thai will leave you spoilt for choices. From more than 20 variety of tapas bites to unique Thai cocktail concoctions, enjoy the authentic Thai experience and take your taste buds on a flavour explosion. 

Host your event at our restaurant and enjoy our delicious authentic Thai cuisines. Perfect for corporate event, networking, client dinners and birthday parties.

Cookyn Inc believes in Making Food Fun by fostering interactions amongst people, be it in a social group or a corporate department. More than just a cooking school, we understand that cooking is just part of the fun in working together to create memories that will last for a long time. We also seek to provide wholesome food for your private parties and celebrate special milestones from a full month party to a 60th Birthday bash at our venue.

The Queen & Mangosteen is more than just an average English pub in Singapore. It is known to serve great food, underrated Pub Grub as well as handcrafted micro-brewed beers from Archipelago, the first commercial brewery in Singapore since 1931. This family-friendly Gourmet British Pub also serves a selection of kids meals. Located at VivoCity, it makes a lively pit stop in between your shopping-day-out as well as providing million dollar views of Sentosa Island.

The Queen & Mangosteen is an amazing spot for hosting all kinds of events. From hosting an intimate party with just you and you close friends - birthday parties, team-bonding, team-building and business dinner or huge events - corporate function, corporate party, etc!

Located in the midst of CHIJMES’ lush garden setting, Privé is an oasis of relaxation for urbanites who are looking for a little respite from the hustle and bustle of the city. The casual atmosphere and unassuming design makes you almost feel like you are stepping into someone’s backyard and immediately puts you in the mood for some socialising over good food and drinks. Take in the lush greenery from the surrounding courtyard and immerse yourself in the old-world charm as you savour a fuss-free meal under the cool shade of the many trees or nurse a refreshing mojito under a blanket of stars. The one-of-a-kind venue is suitable for hosting birthday parties, Christmas parties, proposal, business luncheon, business dinners, etc!

The Muffinry Bakery and cafe make exotic and awesome tasting desserts ranging from tarts, cakes, scones, homemade granola, cookies. This little shop also offers a variety of other savory treats such as pies, quiches and sandwiches. Other than the delicious treats, they have a beverage menu which features their signature blend of coffee, teas, and smoothies. Currently, the Muffinry Bakery and Cafe offers wines from the cellars of Domaine de la Baume and a range of craft beers to take you into the night!

The Muffinry Bakery and Cafe have grown upwards to offer more seating. The second and mezzanine floors of this shophouse offer a hideaway amidst the bustle of the CBD. This space which has hosted corporate events, private parties…even a few marriage proposals!... is cheerful by day – filled with natural light, and has a mellow, chilled vibe as the sun sets – a perfect spot to unwind and swap stories of the day before heading home.

For a truly memorable affair, enjoy the lavishness of a wedding ceremony onboard The Royal Albatross. The grace and elegance of this ship provides the perfect setting for a gorgeous wedding, step into the elegant ambience of a bygone era . Relax with the gentle breeze and let the romantic atmosphere leave you and your guests feeling enthralled aboard the Royal Albatross for a dreamy waterfront wedding.

Offering gorgeous views of the South China Sea,  the ship is an exclusive and impressive alternative to conventional wedding venues which we can integrate with The Pavilion By The Sea. This idyllic harbour-front setting offers a unique alternative venue for those looking for an outdoor alfresco theme. Your guests will delight with a breathtaking sea view of the waterfront and beyond. The Pavilion offers a garden lawn area for creative set-ups or hosting of pre-wedding activities, be it an English garden themed day or a classic wedding at night under the stars embracing the cool sea breeze

Situated in a cozy corner in a row of vintage shop house along Lorong Kilat, East Manhattan Café nicely decorated interior with hipster rustic theme undoubtedly would bring back memories of the good old days. Be charmed by its unique deco of Manhattan style picture and poster while being wowed by its artistic furniture that is full of character. Pamper the palate further with our artisan bread, usually consisting of not more than five ingredients, its texture and flavour are generally superior to that of commercial breads. Making your event a memorable experience is important to us

With ample parking space next to the café and a location a little off Bukit Timah, your guest would have minimal difficulties in attending your event hosted with East Manhattan. This unique venue is ideal for all kinds of events ranging from Private Parties, Corporate Function, Marketing Event to Media Launch. Making your event a memorable experience is important to East Manhattan!

Ideal for a weekend soirée or corporate getaway with Sevens.Possess the ultimate luxurious motor yachts. It is an impressive 50-footer, Sgyacht is fresh off the drawing boards of the BMW design team. It boasts a luxurious cherry wood salon interior with sleek leather lounges. Its generous aft deck features a roomy lounge that seats 13 adults. And its large cockpit is great for a variety of watersports. You can expect the best of speed and adventure.The latest inclusion to Sgyacht’s fleet, the winner of the 2005 cruiser of the year, this Riviera M400 sports cruiser is the perfect combination of speed, style and sensuality.Sevens is truly an embodiment of Riviera heritage. All the familiar and reassuring aspects of Riviera boatbuilding DNA; the purposeful lines, hefty scantlings, the solid feel in a seaway, spacious layout and Euro style luxurious décor. This luxurious yacht will be the perfect getaway party venue from anniversaries to corporate party, SG Yacht is sure to make this an occasion to remember!

Owned by Lloyd Marine, this beautiful Lagoon 400 sailing catamaran is ideal for intimate gatherings of up to 18 people. Drop anchor in the sheltered bays of Singapore Southern Islands and enjoy a BBQ on deck, kayaking and paddle-boarding by day or entertain in style on a sunset cruise, with the stunning Singapore skyline as your backdrop.

Enjoy a day out in the sun with Lagoon 400 ’Tahnee’. With the warm sun and cooling sea breeze, this place is great for hosting small and intimate parties - 21st Birthday parties, corporate parties, office parties, team-bonding activities, and many more events!

Brand new to the Singapore charter scene and managed by Lloyd Marine, this clipper-style, 45-foot motor yacht is ideal for all kinds of occasions from fishing trips or entertaining up to 12 guests. With 3 cabins specially designed for maximum comfort, the saloon and cabins are both air-conditioned and a double sunbed out on the foredeck. This unusual event space is an ideal location for sea lovers. 

With Alaska 45 Motor Yacht, guests can party away in the warm sun and cool sea breeze. She is fully equipped and ready to whisk you and your guests to the Singapore Southern Islands for a fun day out on the water.

Set up in 1995, Al Forno East Coast is the first Italian restaurant in Singapore to import fresh ingredients like whole peeled tomatoes and cheeses directly from Italy. Complimenting these best ingredients, the Italian pizza-maker bakes with a traditional wood fire oven that gives a splendid taste to the pizzas and fresh bread that you can only find in a true traditional Italian restaurant. 

Perched at the bottom of a shophouse, the unique location of Al Forno gives this venue a homely and cozy vibe to the restaurant which makes it an awesome location for intimate Birthday parties, Christmas parties or just a place to gather with friends and family.

Dancing Crab serves a mix of robust, country-style Cajun seafood and the distinctive richness of Creole cuisine. This restaurant is an American counterpart to Singapore's equally famed preferences for seafood, shellfish and rich flavors. Backed by one of Singapore's oldest seafood restaurant leaders, TungLok Group, Dancing Crab sources their shellfish from the same vendors used at the group's best seafood restaurants, offering a range from Boston lobster to Dungeness crab. 

Dancing Crab is known for their happy atmosphere, lively music, and high spirits. A venue that brims with life, bringing the same emphasis to its colourful location at The Grandstand. They are a place that welcomes their guests to eat, drink, and be merry. Dancing Crab is perfect for any joyous occasion such as birthday parties, team bonding, office parties and even happy hour!

Residing at the swanky Purvis Street, Gunther’s bring about sophisticated French fare to the chic fine dining scene. The meticulously-crafted restaurant, whose name yields the personality of Gunther himself, the man behind this establishment, depicts the realization of a dream that he has over the years, that is a place to call his home.

"Opening Gunther’s is not just a dream come true, it’s the realisation of a home — my home. This is where I devise and visualise my creations. This is where I could finally present cuisines that I truly call my own." - Chef Gunther Hubreschen

This impeccable location and exquisite food brings out the best In every event and is a great venue to host business luncheon, business dinners, client meeting, corporate functions, etc.

The Ferretti 630 represents a new challenge for the experienced team made by Zuccon International Project Studio and the Engineering Division of Ferretti Yachts which designed a superb yacht incomparable for space and brightness. The external shape has been made very aggressive thanks to a new spherical unique window that goes from the stern to the bow. Inside a 360 degrees view offers the feeling of being into an open space yacht. Many interior solutions has been used to enlarge the space for guests offering a unique comfort. The master cabin presents an open view window, another big effort in terms of space optimization which made the 630 a yacht more similar to the bigger boats of the Ferretti Yachts range. Host your intimate private event with RuLin Ferretti 630. Be it a birthday party, company party or just a anniversary celebration, this yacht will make it a day to remember! Prices:Single day charter bookings, 4 Hours cruising /18pax + 3 hours complimentary dockside/25pax* @ SGD2600OPTIONAL WATER SPORTS ACTIVITIES: Inflatable Water Slide $400/4 Hours & Yamaha Jet Ski $400/4 HoursEmbarkation/Disembarkation: One15 Marina to Southern Islands, Singapore

White Sails Yacht is a luxury yacht company that has always kept their yacht in showroom condition. White Sails Yacht represents the most reputable, first class, full-service yacht in Singapore and their yacht has been carefully selected to meet the exceptionally high standards by the company. Being dedicated to providing their guests only the best and highest quality choices possible, guests will not be disappointed to the type of yacht available for booking. 

The StarGazer is one of the luxury yachts with full facilities onboard. This yacht comes with a comfortable seating area, a kitchen and a spacious bed. This yacht is truly a home on the waters and is perfect for hosting events such as anniversaries, proposal, birthday parties and even office parties.

Sen of Japan is a casual dining Japanese restaurant and bar. Their dishes are designed by Chef Nakano Hiromi, who used to head the famous NOBU at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Las Vegas. Outfitted with blond wood bar counters and floor-to-ceiling windows, the unrivaled views are coupled with fresh and expertly prepared dishes. Sen of Japan provides a undeniably exotic experience for their diners. With great scenic views of the Singapore Skyline and the Promenade, your event, be it a Christmas party, corporate party, year end party or just a small and intimate birthday party is set to be a memorable one at Sen of Japan.

BIN 38 - the ultimate experience in private dining. Located on level 2, the exclusive three-part space comprises of Chef-Owner Ryan Clift's state-of-the-art R&D test kitchen, a 34-seater cocktail lounge and an intimate 12-seater dining area – encapsulating the full Tippling Club experience in a private space. Every event at Tippling Club is customized and personalized regardless of size. Here, we have an award winning team (led by Chef Ryan), that can create a menu and experience tailored to our guests’ needs. With one of the most innovative kitchens and best stocked bars in Asia, we take pride in the quality and creativity of each Tippling Club event. The unique venue layout allows us to design one-of-a-kind food and cocktail master classes for you and your guests.

With a standing capacity of up to 60 pax, BIN 38 is the perfect venue for networking, presentations, product launches, VIP registrations, press conferences, birthday/ festive celebrations or a dinner treat to thank your team and clients.

TongKang Riverboat Dining at Clarke Quay presents experiential dining on the last surviving pair of tongkangs (light boats for carrying goods) in Singapore. The first of these two treasured tongkangs or Bar Boat houses a bar, perfect for after-work drinks or corporate parties. The second boat or Restaurant Boat is where diners will enjoy exquisite cuisine aboard this historic vessel. 

Additionally, you can entertain your business associates at a private meal or hold your theme parties and soiree for your weddings and stag nights. The view of the sunset and gentle breeze completes the memorable experience.

Welcome to Wine Universe, where a treasury of wines from all over the world await you! Located in a corner of Millenia Walk in Singapore, this restaurant glassy exterior with its sidewalk alfresco lounge invites guests to step into its dynamic space incorporating a restaurant, a wine bar and retail-cellar. Paired with a menu featuring contemporary Swiss cuisine, the food and wines presented enhance each other, elevating guests’ culinary experience to a new level.

Prepare yourself for a modern and elegant dinner party with friends and family at Wine Universe. The stunning interior design and delectable food will surely make your party a night to remember! Have fun hosting with Wine Universe, regardless of the event - birthday party, wedding, business dinner, anniversary, your party will surely be an extraordinary one!

tagline: Baja Fresh Mexican Grill - Event Space
description:
Nestled in the heart of the city, Baja Fresh Mexican Grill offers two event spaces for your perfect Mexican fiesta. Our second spot is at Baja Fresh Mexican Grill at Rendezvous Hotel.

An exciting place for taco, burritos and margaritas lover, it is the perfect location for office parties and weekend parties, birthdays, cocktail parties, happy hour and even baby showers.

OSG-Our Simple Goodness is a multi-cuisine live music bar at Suntec City with a mission of spreading LOVE through Our Simple act of Goodness. This bar gives off a cozy and intimate vibe which is perfect for customers to just kick back and have a fun and relaxing time with friends. 

With delicious food and cozy interior, this awesome bar, cafe, event space is great for get-togethers with friends and family, birthday parties, Christmas parties, happy hour and many more!

Earl of Hindh is the brainchild of a team of enterprising expat Indian entrepreneurs. Earl of Hindh is their quest of reinvigorating the inimitable Indian disposition that seeks to balance materialistic achievement and glory on the one hand and philosophical and cultural refinement on the other. Indians do not see any contradictions in both these pursuits. Our mission is to bring to the world the finest of Indian cuisine. However, Indian cuisine is not just about food. It is a holistic experience that is deeply embedded in our rich social traditions. For thousands of years Indians have experimented with and perfected hospitality in their unique way. 

Earl of Hindh aim is to bring the opulence, once enjoyed by the royalty of India, to those who have earned their right to it in modern times. Combining traditional Indian style with a touch of moronity to this restaurant, Earl of Hindh is an exquisite site for hosting unique theme parties - birthday parties, bachelor parties, bridal showers, hen parties, etc.

A unique dining concept from Open Door Policy, where the rustic flavors of Southeast Asia are celebrated in the signature refinement of Ryan Clift from Tippling Club. Immersed in the region’s culture and inspired by its culinary tastes, Clift's culinary team headed up by Chef Miller Mai delivers modern interpretations of Southeast Asian cuisine paired with specially handcrafted Asian cocktails and boutique wines. Tuck in to share plates of familiar flavors executed by way of the Western influence and progressive techniques, ideally experienced via the Feed Us menu – the best way to get acquainted with Ding Dong.

Experience the true Southeast Asian culture with Ding Dong through their mouthwatering food and delicious tasting cocktail. This one-of-a-kind Southeast Asian restaurant is suitable for all types of events including birthday parties, year-end parties, team bonding and also business dinners!

Whether you are a wine connoisseur or just the occasional wine lover, at Napoleon you will be able to enjoy wines at your pace and comfort, in a cozy atmosphere. Its innovative concept, revolving around pairing and sharing, offers the chance to taste 32 European wines by the glass and pair them with the Singaporean chef's interpretation of Southern European casual cuisine.

Discover our food and wine matching suggestions specially created around defined categories of wines. Napoleon Food & Wine Bar has a dedicated team who will assist you in creating a phenomenal event, regardless whether it is a simple birthday party or a lavish corporate function, it will surely be a memorable one!

Laughing Juice is an exclusive venue, suitable for private luncheons/dinners, birthday parties, gatherings and product launches. The venue is located 5 minutes from Orchard MRT and has easy access to parking. Laughing Juice also provides private chef services and offers a range of boutique whiskeys, wines, and spirits. 

The exclusivity of the venue makes it a perfect fit for Bachelorette parties, Hen parties & parties that can get a little wild. Celebrate your event here and have a cherishable hangover worthy experience you will never forget. What happens at Laughing Juice, stays in Laughing juice.

Since its inception in 1971, fine dining Indian restaurant Rang Mahal at Pan Pacific Singapore represents a legacy of gastronomic excellence of over four decades in visionary culinary dedication. Serving traditional authentic Indian food, the award winning restaurant continues to remain true to its roots with the constant push of innovation, which is presented in an exceptional menu that marries contemporary and heritage. Complemented with their impeccable service, diners can expect an extraordinary dining experience that is built upon a foundation of unwavering passion. In the unrelenting pursuit of excellence, Rang Mahal embarked on a transformation in 2012 and reopened with an elegant and timeless look. Awarded the esteemed Singapore Brand Prestige Award in 2009 and Singapore Tatler Best Restaurants consecutively since 2010, Rang Mahal continues to push the boundaries to provide a holistic award winning dining experience. Owned by Singapore-based Hind Group, Rang Mahal Restaurants presents authentic traditional Indian fare in modern, minimalistic forms and is known for its contemporary and stylish interiors. Regardless if it is a simple birthday party or a lavish corporate function, Rang Mahal will make your event an unforgettable one!

FYR Cycene Ond Drinc (pronounced as FIRE Kitchen and Drink) is a casual dining restaurant and bar located at 19, Boon Tat Street. Against the backdrop of Chinatown’s historic allure, FYR promises an intriguing experience that harks back to a simpler time. It’s interior is a decidedly rugged vibe, flavoured by an overhanging vintage chandelier, sepia-hued wall mural and hardwood benches. 

Even its moniker is as old as time – it is the etymology of fire, the chiefest of elements in cooking. Juxtaposing this intricate tapestry of olden-day charm is FYR’s modern European-style cuisines. Exotic herbs and spices of Southeast Asia go into every dish, intensifying the taste. All of FYR’s cuisine and dishes are whipped up using the Josper Charcoal Oven. The chefs of FYR use lychee wood, which gives the dishes a wonderful smoky note that is tinged with sweetness. FYR is helmed by a management team and key service staff who collectively have more than 15 years of experience. With good food and the lively atmosphere, this area is perfect hosting all kinds of activities such as birthday parties, bachelor parties, hen parties and so forth.

The Amethyst was developed to set a new standard as the state-of-the-art, pure-bred Aquila 48 Power Catamaran1 with a perfect balance between luxurious comfort and performance. The main deck offers extended spaces for living large, with beautiful panoramic views and access to both forward and aft covered cockpit seating areas. Inside, comfortable saloon seating ensures leisurely dining and entertainment. The galley is ergonomically designed with the most modern of appliances, and all the cabins are well-lit thanks to their panoramic windows and offer spacious en-suite bathrooms and showers stalls.

Pleasing modern lines set the Amethyst in a league of her own and moving around this boat is a breeze for all. Access to the flybridge from one of five convenient stairways – the interior salon, or the innovative forward and aft secure stairways. A large entertainment and dining area on the flybridge with barbecue with wet bar. On the main deck, outside shaded areas in the front and rear ensure leisurely relaxation on every level. Everywhere you look on board the Amethyst, you will find quality without compromise. So plan your next team-bonding, birthday, Christmas party on board this majestic yacht and have a whale of a time.

Ideal for a weekend soirée or corporate getaway, Sgyacht and Sevens possess the ultimate luxurious motor yachts. It is an impressive 50-footer, Sgyacht is fresh off the drawing boards of the BMW design team. It boasts a luxurious cherry wood salon interior with sleek leather lounges. Its generous aft deck features a roomy lounge that seats 13 adults. And its large cockpit is great for a variety of watersports. Generous seating in the open salon enhances the overall comfort level. And a face-to-face dinette completes the relaxed living space. The popular design offers two quiet staterooms complemented by two ensuite heads. The tranquil master stateroom includes private sliding-door access to the cockpit for added comfort. This exceptional layout is completed with beautiful handcrafted cherry wood furnishings in a superior high-gloss wood finish. Sgyacht’s interior is all about form and function. As you’ll be hooked up to a massive selection of movies with a 40-inch television. Music can also be played through the fly bridge and interior stereo systems. This fully decked out yacht will be the perfect getaway party venue from anniversaries to corporate party, SG Yacht is sure to make this an occasion to remember!

Affectionately known as No.5, this bar has become the favorite “watering hole” for many locals, expatriates and tourists since 1991. Housed in a 1910 Peranakan shophouse, the old charm and flavor of the Peranakan are retained with the original wall paint, antique carvings and unpolished wooden floorboards still intact. Just minutes away from the busy hub of Orchard Road, the quaintness of Emerald Hill and the charisma of the architecture provide a warm and cozy ambiance at No.5. 

Customers will feel immediately at home when they step into the bar. Serving an impressive range of international cocktails, mocktails, shooters, long drinks, beers and spirits using premium labels as house pours! This unique shophouse bar is great for knocking down a few beers with friends and family or have a lavish birthday party with some tasty alcoholic cocktails!

With influences from the Mediterranean, Miska Cafe is dedicated to provide a relaxed gathering place for friends and families, with a breathtaking view of the marina. Come and experience an authentic yet modern experience, through a creative Mediterranean menu that combines fresh products, homemade sauces and dressings, a subtle blend of spices and exotic flavours. Complement your meals or chill out evenings with a wide selection of cold draught beer, wines, margaritas, cocktails and specialty drinks that are available from the bar.

Complementing the appetising food is the pretty view of the island. Situated in Sentosa, guests get the front row seat to the gorgeous view of the Sentosa waters. Be it a simple get together with friends and family or a grand party - corporate party, year end party or Christmas party, Miska Cafe will help you host an event that is a night to remember!

Pizzeria Giardino was established at Chijmes in 2004 and they have recently re-opened a new restaurant in CHIJMES under the name Giardino Pizza Bar & Grill. Giardino! is a casual Italian restaurant, specializing in rustic yet refined Italian food with an authentic flair. They offer classic and artisan pizzas that are hand-crafted and cooked to order in their wood-fired oven, which is visible throughout the restaurant. All their entrees are made from scratch from the highest quality, imported and domestic, ingredients. 

Apart from their amazing tasting food, the ambiance and décor are second to none. This space has a distinct personality that sets a mood for high-energy fun and entertainment. Combining good food with the stunning interior design, Giardino Pizza & Bar is best suited for all sorts of events including proposal, anniversary party, Christmas party, team-bonding and many more!

Featuring state of the art play equipment, custom built to promote parent-child bonding through multi-sensory play.

Located in the epicenter of Suntec City, KURO Izakaya is a Japanese gastro bar; firing up Robatayaki and Kushiyaki it also houses a great selection of Whisky and Sake. Impress your guest with their unique Japanese canapes from Yakitori, Hamachi Crudo, Assorted Maki, Matcha Tiramisu Shooters and many more while they indulge in booze from the open bar. 

The Japanese-style Binchō-tan meets Kintsukuroi interior spring a chic contemporary mélange creating the perfect atmosphere to shoot the breeze at an after-work party or mingle at a networking session. This daring mishmash of elements tap into the beauty of gold with a burst of black creating a harmonies hue that evokes images of indulgence and affluence – a place you’d want to be and a place to be seen!

YC also known as Yum Cha is located at UE Bizhub East. Yum Cha is a Chinese restaurant that serves authentic traditional Chinese food. Adorned with Chinese inspired lantern lights, wooden chairs and gorgeous flower setup on every table, YC events space makes guests feel right at home. The huge window panes lining the walls of this venue allow natural daylight to shine through, making the event space look spacious and inviting. 

YC Events Space at Changi suitable for your corporate events like a meeting, presentations, workshops, dinner and dance, etc or social event like weddings, birthday, baby shower, engagement etc.

Evoking the decadence of an emperor’s courtyard and seating up to 200 diners, Kai Garden is the premier dining destination in Marina Square headed by Owner and Executive Chef Fung Chi Keung, an award-winning chef whose inimitable style and sumptuous Cantonese dishes have placed him among the elite of Chinese chefs in Singapore. 

With a flexible layout including the main dining hall, a multipurpose function room and four individual private VIP rooms, the host can pick and choose a particular room or hall that best suit the event. The different room sizes cater to all types of events regardless of size and it is perfect for hosting small intimate parties - 50th birthday parties, 60th birthday parties, year-end parties to large formal events - business luncheon, business dinner, corporate function and company party.

On the Table takes pride in serving up the most delicious comfort fare, believing that you deserve only the best food and service. The interior exudes a raw industrial vibe, yet retains a cozy and comfortable atmosphere perfect for any form of gatherings. With a public car park and Pasir Panjang MRT station just right at our doorstep, our event venue is easily accessible and your guests will have no difficulties locating the café at all!

We know that good times only begin in the presence of great food and amazing company. On the table will help you with the former and all you need to do is to bring in your favorite family and friends for a grand celebration! Birthdays parties, company parties, social gatherings and other celebrations are always welcome here at On the table.

Owned by Lloyd Marine, this beautiful Lagoon 400 sailing catamaran is ideal for intimate gatherings of up to 18 people. Drop anchor in the sheltered bays of Singapore Southern Islands and enjoy a BBQ on deck, kayaking and paddle-boarding by day or entertain in style on a sunset cruise, with the stunning Singapore skyline as your backdrop.

Have a fun time with Lagoon 450 ‘Elysium’. This majestic yacht will be the perfect location for just hanging out with friends and family. Be it a birthday party, new year eve party, Christmas party, this place will surely make your event a day to remember.

Designed by architects Morrelli & Melvin and built by award-winning SA boat builder Robertson & Caine, Mikanna features groundbreaking innovations in comfort, safety, and performance. Mikanna represents the next generation of power catamaran luxury yachts, which was designed specifically for your enjoyment. Mikanna features outdoor and indoor dining areas, a fully equipped galley, spacious saloon, and a cocktail bar off the galley. There are 4 suits with Showers. The flybridge on top of the main salon comes complete with wrap around seating for 8, a wet bar, BBQ, cooler, and drink holders. This spacious and luxurious yacht can accommodate comfortably 26 guests.

Mikanna is the first yacht in Singapore to have projector screen installed which can be used for presentation or movies. It is a perfect location to entertain your family, guests or clients for corporate & private events, birthdays, anniversaries or a daily family outing.

Origin Sin is a Mediterranean Restaurant with a menu catered for all lovers of Mediterranean and vegetarian food with a wide selection of wines and beverages. This restaurant can accommodate 100 seating capacity of our restaurant, 50 indoor and 50 outdoor. They can cater to 200 guests for a cocktail party, seating and standing included. 

At night, Origin Sin is known to have a candlelight ambiance indoors and outdoors. With a nice garden table at the outdoor seating area, diners can have a gorgeous view of the night skies. Should the need arises, Origin sin is able to display an outdoor bar and a DJ Console. The restaurant can be booked separately by indoor or outdoor or both spaces together for the event organizer's flexibility. The versatile nature that the restaurant provides make this the perfect venue for hosting parties, anniversaries, corporate functions, business luncheons, business dinners and many other events!

Brought up in a family of successful restaurateurs in his hometown in the south of Italy, owner and chef Toni Rossetti brings to his very own restaurant – NOTI Restaurant & Bar, a taste of home, tradition and warmth of authentic Italian food from cherished family recipes and the flavors from this bountiful region. In a contemporary interior that exudes a trendy vibe, Toni and his team provide the guests with the consummate dining experience of good food and great hospitality that has become the signature of Noti restaurant and bar.

Located at Club Street, this eye-catching brightly colored yellow shophouse has a modern and trendy interior design. Playing around with red, black and beige colors, this trendy Italian restaurant gives off a luxurious vibe, making it suitable for hosting important business luncheons, dinners or just a simple gathering among friends!

FUN Ambassadors are always ready to organize exciting activities and unforgettable celebrations for that special day in every child and parents’ lives.

Favorably located at the city fringe (just outside of Singapore’s Central Business District) and nestled in the charming, eclectic Jalan Besar neighborhood, Butter Studio is a cozy respite from the urban hustle and bustle. Housed in a heritage conservation shophouse and the homely, rustic furnishings within the store create a relaxed and comforting ambiance. Butter Studio is a homegrown artisan bakery dedicated to honoring the craft of home baking while infusing a playful spin on familiar comforting bakes. Handcrafted fresh daily with fine quality ingredients, signature favorites include the Salted Caramel Red Velvet cake, Speculoos Ondeh cake and Sea Salt Nutella tart.

It’s a perfect venue for birthday celebrations, family gatherings, engagement parties, team meetings and corporate functions. As a versatile unique space, it is also suitable for conducting workshops, masterclasses and seminars for team bonding sessions.

The Projector is not your average cinema, this space is a genuine alternative to the conventional cineplex. Their unique space has been adaptively reused to facilitate a wide range of activities and events beyond traditional movie screenings. The Projector resides in an often overlooked piece of local architecture - Golden Mile Tower, a modernist architectural icon of early Singapore. The space calls subtle attention to the past glory of a beloved old cinema. Special elements of the space harken back to its past: vintage signage, original flip-up theatre seats with wooden armrests, fabric walls, and floor lettering denoting the rows of seats have all been retained. 

With a classic cinema hall, an experimental cinema and entertainment space with extended stage, and a sunlit cafe foyer with panoramic city views, The Projector is an ideal setting for a range of traditional or one-of-a-kind events, from a simple event such as a corporate seminar to a huge and lavish event like a product launch or product exhibition, The Projector got you covered!

Either or both of our halls (left, right) are available for hire, each includes use of the Cafe reception/lobby area (below right) for additional space and programming needs. Each hall has been updated and redesigned to facilitate a range of events types. The space is easily accessible via direct elevator from the ground floor. Venue packages start from $2,500 based on 4-hour block slots!

Located in the up and coming Jalan Besar precinct, iNCOGNiTO is a collaboration with the good folks from Chye Seng Huat Hardware. When the sun sets, the hip coffee bar melds into iNCOGNiTO, a craft beer bar with a twist. iNCOGNiTO is all about craft beers on tap, special releases, rare cellared beers and hearty food with a twist.

The CSHH Coffee Bar features the first 360-degree coffee bar in Singapore, where it highlights the barista’s brewing craft. The bar features espresso-based and single origin coffee. The cold brew coffee is bottled and served with milk and simple syrup on the side. For beer lovers, Papa Palheta has collaborated with local brewers, Jungle Beer, to come up with a coffee beer using Papa Palheta’s signature blend, Terra Firma. For tummy-fillers, the bar features pairings of coffee and our baked goods. The kitchen serves sandwiches, patties, pancakes and a meat platter.

This minimalistic style bar is perfect for hosting all sorts of events, including business brunch, media event, influencer event and birthday parties.

Ristorante Pietrasanta is a dining outlet which embraces the concept of a Family Restaurant in Tuscany Style. Ristorante Pietrasanta’s focus is to delight every customer with an authentic Tuscan dining experience. Served in a comfortable and home-like Italian environment, the restaurant is an ideal getaway from the hustle and bustle of city life, especially for those who want to relax and chill out in a cosy place. Culture and gastronomy have always been in the heart of the family which hails from the artistic town of Pietrasanta in Tuscany. This space can host up to 120 standing or 80 sitting event. Casa Pietrasanta - the private dining room, is designed to cater for groups to enjoy private dining experience at a warm and cosy venue. It is an ideal location to host your special event. Equipped with a private kitchen and wine cellar, our team of accommodating chef and staff welcomes you to experience a special and memorable time. This exclusive space can take up to 60 standing or 34 sitting event.

Alfresco dining at D Paolo BistroBar is exceptional cuisine in a stylishly laid-back environment. With huge window panes, this unique location offers natural and warm daylight and at night, this location offers a picturesque view of the night skies. Being a modern and elegant restaurant, the place is a romantic location perfect for events like anniversaries, proposal, ceremony or even a wedding reception.

A contemporary European menu offers lovingly prepared dishes. Enjoy a surprising set lunch, drop by for our Sunday brunch, or unwind over fresh signature cocktails. This combination of culinary delights, heavenly drinks and breezy-ambience also makes BistroBar the ideal location for a memorable event.

Learning Studios @ Lifelong Learning Academy is an ideal venue for all sorts of training, meetings and seminars. With flexible partitioning of each room, it could cater to various group sizes. Each partition has been soundproofed, leaving distraction or eavesdropping the last worry on your mind. Equipped with a state of the art projector and audio system, your presentation would be a walkover with your message effectively conveyed to your attendees. 

Strategically located beside MacPherson MRT station coupled with a bus stop a short walk away, accessibility is definitely not a hassle for your attendees. Various setups for seminars and training are available with the help of the friendly team at the academy.

A modern-Japanese restaurant set within the center of a heritage building overlooking Singapore’s beautiful Marina Bay waterfront, Kinki Restaurant serves up unique non-conventional Japanese dishes using the freshest ingredients and the most creative of flavor combinations – all served at the highest quality. Experience the culinary artistry in Kinki’s signature dishes like the Foie Gras and Scallop Sushi and Tai Carpaccio of thinly sliced sea bream with shio konbu and truffle oil. Taste the specially concocted truffle oil, Kinki Truffle Oil, in the aromatic Tai Carpaccio. Its drinks list is a medley of ‘East meets West’ cocktails and traditional Japanese liquor built to complement its food and all local and international palates.

The brand’s cheeky, hip and playful attitude permeates from its interiors which includes an attention-grabbing floor mural designed by tattoo artist Christ Garver of Miami Ink fame, to its personable and enthusiastic service and culinary team. With the gorgeous waterfront view, it makes for a good place for business meetings amongst expatriates and office executives working nearby. As Singapore’s first graffiti art bar, Kinki Rooftop Bar is the epitome of a Tokyo underground scene. Set within an urban landscape with a spectacular view of the Marina Bay waterfront, the bar is filled with edgy graffiti and warm lights to set a hip yet relaxing and unpretentious vibe for friends to hang out. Kinki Restaurant + Bar is a great event venue for hosting parties, team-bonding get-together, office parties and even happy hour with friends!

Deck is a Groundbreaking Art Space & Unique Event Space launched with the mission to support and nurture the community of photography enthusiasts in Singapore and Southeast Asia. It houses a Gallery, Resource Library, Activity Studio, Artist’s Studio and Café within 19 magnificent shipping containers, creatively assembled to overcome the challenge of land scarcity in our small city. 

It is an art connector between two art institutions in the Bras Basah District, and offers an accessible venue for people to celebrate photography right in the city centre of Singapore. Perfect event venue for product launches, fashion shows, corporate celebrations, roadshows and fundraising activities.

A chic and laidback dining spot along One Fullerton overlooking a spectacular view of the Marina Bay waterfront, The Pelican serves luxurious yet comforting East Coast American cuisine grounded in the freshest seafood prepped skillfully by its culinary team. Dishes are inspired by the notion of homecoming celebrations and are created for sharing. These include seafood platters, boils and raw bar options. The drinks menu includes classic cocktails with a twist alongside an extensive list of wines. 

The interiors of the indoor restaurant are lavish with large comfortable leather booths, elegant black and white marble flooring and an eclectic mix of vintage items. At the outdoor Pelican Deck, guests can enjoy the breeze and sunset while enjoying regular oyster deals alongside DJ beats focused on the popular funky house, RnB and Hip Hop tracks. With appetising food, modern furnishings and up-to-date popular spins, The Pelican is a popular spot for hosting events such as birthday party, bachelor party, hen party, bridal shower, etc!

Best known for his work in the puppet show, ‘Punch & Judy’, Mr Punch now introduces his latest venture at 26 Seah Street: Mr Punch Public House. Iconic for its walls, which are adorned with vintage enamel and tin signs, the space exudes just the kind of odd familiarity that makes it feel like home to a travelling old-timer. Cozy and intimate, the basement is perfect for casual events and private get-together, while the wild and free can find their home at the rooftop. 

True to his puppet shows origin, Mr Punch adds showmanship to each event, from his Opening Act table to his Finale display. Mr Punch Public House provide the inspiration and the venue that will make your event be it a birthday party or a company get-together a truly memorable and unique one!

Established in 2000 on 21 Club Street, Senso Ristorante & Bar is well-known for its authentic Italian fine-dining cuisine (cucina italiana) and its impeccable service. Senso Ristorante & Bar firmly believes in maintaining its high standards of excellent food, warm and sophisticated atmosphere. Upon entering Senso, diners will be enthralled by the understated elegance and sophistication of this 156-seater establishment that occupies five heritage shophouses.At Senso Ristorante & Bar, you and your guests get to enjoy the exquisite Italian food, the friendly service and the overall warm and welcoming atmosphere. This place is perfect for hosting events such as anniversaries, birthday parties, Christmas parties, business dinners and many more!

Hungry Heroes is the first superhero theme cafe and restaurant in Singapore. Amassed over the last 25 years, Hungry Heroes displays countless original and licensed superhero memorabilia from Marvel & other comics, including life-sized statues, head busts, figurines and movie posters. This restaurant and bar specialising in hearty meats and American delights. From the nuclear-powered kitchen, specialty meat is the name of the game and share-worthy platters of tender cuts are the superpowers of Hungry Heroes.

Located in a surprisingly quaint part of Little India, Hungry Heroes is housed in a charming and nostalgic conservational shophouse. The gorgeously quirky interior space makes it an excellent venue for fun and intimate events such as birthday parties, team-bonding, kid’s birthday parties, baby shower and many more!. Provide an enjoyable experience for your guests with hearty grilled meats paired with tasty craft beers.

Housed on the second storey of a restored conservation shophouse in Tanjong Pagar, Group Therapy Duxton is an intimate and charming space with a loft-like ceiling that affords you the flexibility to host your events in comfort and style.

MINT Museum of Toy’s contemporary building, located in Singapore’s Civic District, offers unique spaces to host both corporate & private events. The unique decor offers a one-of-a-kind experience that will inspire nostalgia and the child in every one of us.

Bringing back old childhood memories, these unique place is perfect for hosting kids birthday parties, one-of-a-kind wedding ceremonies and small and intimate team-bonding activities, etc!
